PanelTitle.Label: Fly/Walk Options
PanelTitle.ShortHelp: Defines the options used when navigating in Fly or Walk mode.

InitialPosition.Label: Initial position
InitialPosition.ShortHelp: Places the avatar on its initial position when you start navigating.

Pick.Label: Pick
Pick.ShortHelp: Lets you pick in the 3D scene to define the avatar's initial position.

ThirdPerson.Label: Third person
ThirdPerson.ShortHelp: Displays the avatar as a third person.

Collision.Label: Collision
Collision.ShortHelp: Defines the options related to the Collision mode.

Gravity.Label: Gravity
Gravity.ShortHelp: Enables the avatar to go up or down the stairs.

EnableTransparent.Label: Collision with transparent objects
EnableTransparent.ShortHelp: Enables the collision with transparent objects.

Navigation.Label: Navigation
Navigation.ShortHelp: Defines the options related to the navigation.

PointerLock.Label: First person
PointerLock.ShortHelp: Moves the camera using the keyboard and the mouse pointer to specify the direction.

AutoSelectGround.Label: Ground automatically defined
AutoSelectGround.ShortHelp: Ground will be automatacally decided,in case of Point Cloud user must define ground height.

Completely_Collided.Label: The Collision mode is activated, but you are blocked on all sides. Change your position, and then try again.

Move_To_Other_Dir.Label: Move in another direction. The Collision mode is activated.

Stopped_Ahead.Label: Move in another direction, you cannot move ahead.

Stuck.Label: You may be inside model, use "Step back" (Keyboard Shortcut "R").

No_Floor.Label: There is no floor ahead, move in another direction.

No_Floor_No_Collision.Label: There is no floor below the feet, the Collision mode is not activated.

No_Floor_Collision_Activated.Label: The Collision mode is activated but there is no floor below the feet to let you walk.Use teleport to reposition.

Collision_Already.Label: The Collision mode is already activated.

Select_Correct_Surface.Label: Select a horizontal surface. The currently selected surface is not suitable for walking.

Crouch.Label: You can crouch to move ahead.

Server_Error.Label: Server error, unable to retrieve data.

Unauthorized_Pod.Label: Collision capability is disabled for this tenant.
